feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 04:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
